title: Name on Top, Uppy Down, Blank Back, Color Shift....
author: Gradedcardman

posts.post_title: Name on Top, Uppy Down, Blank Back, Color Shift....
posts.post_content:
For sale are a group of T206 I purchased from a longtime collector who specialized in the oddities. I have tried to price these to move but will take offers. I appreciate you taking the time to scroll through and again offers welcome. PM's are answered in the order received.


Hart SL PD 350- Upside Down Back- $900
Bastian SL PD 350- Upside Down Back- $1200

Howard Blank Back- $1000


Krause Missing color- PD 350- $400
Howard hand cut missing color- $400
I will take the Gibson miscut
